status: Orchestrator session 141 resumed. Focus shifted to CLI tools evaluation per user directive. No new features, improve/debug/eval existing CLI tools only.
recent_achievements: Session 174: Session 176: Fixed critical plugin race condition with directory-based atomic locking (commit e50c7ae). The previous JSON-based locking had a race condition where 4 instances overwrote each other. New solution uses individual lock files in memory/.plugin-instances/ for atomic registration.

Session 174: Session 175: Completed 2 user requests - (1) Added interactive mode to realtime-monitor.ts with send message, create task, show OpenCode sessions, (2) Created comprehensive docs/TOOLS_REFERENCE.md (483 lines). Commit cd0ea50.
Session 174: Session 174: Fixed ctx.$ shell escape bug (commit ae87c93). Replaced 5 instances of shell redirects with appendFileSync to fix JSON logging failures with special characters.

Session 174: Session 170: Fixed critical isPrimaryInstance() race condition (commit 90a5f78). New election mechanism with 150ms delay + smallest ID wins. Logs will no longer duplicate 4x. Also identified ctx.$ shell escape bug for next session.

Session 170: Session 166: Fixed critical duplicate logging bug in plugin. Events were being logged 4x due to missing isPrimaryInstance() checks in tool hooks. Worker commit 5882dc9 adds the checks, reducing future log size by 75%.

achievements: Created OpenCode skills: agent-orchestrator and memory-manager
Fixed knowledge extraction tool - changed from bun x to node
